post.summary:
RegisterPreinstalls defines a governance operation for directly registering
preinstalled contracts in the EVM. The authority is the same as is used for
Params updates.

parameters.description: MsgRegisterPreinstalls defines a Msg for creating preinstalls in evm state.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UpdateParams defined a governance operation for updating the x/vm module
parameters. The authority is hard-coded to the Cosmos SDK x/gov module
account

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams defines a Msg for updating the x/vm module parameters.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: EthereumTx defines a method submitting Ethereum transactions.

parameters.description:
from is the bytes of ethereum signer address. This address value is checked
against the address derived from the signature (V, R, S) using the
secp256k1 elliptic curve
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: raw is the raw ethereum transaction
parameters.name: raw

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

get.summary: Parameters queries the parameters of the module.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessControl.title:
AccessControl defines the permission policy of the EVM
for creating and calling contracts

call.title: call defines the permission policy for calling contracts

create.title: create defines the permission policy for creating contracts

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessControlType.title: AccessControlType defines the permission type for policies

access_control_list.title:
access_control_list defines defines different things depending on the
AccessType:
- ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONLESS: list of addresses that are blocked from
performing the operation
- ACCESS_TYPE_RESTRICTED: ignored
- ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONED: list of addresses that are allowed to perform
the operation

access_type.title: access_type defines which type of permission is required for the operation

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessType.description:
- ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONLESS: ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONLESS does not restrict the operation to anyone
 - ACCESS_TYPE_RESTRICTED: ACCESS_TYPE_RESTRICTED restrict the operation to anyone
 - ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONED: ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONED only allows the operation for specific addresses
cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessType.title: AccessType defines the types of permissions for the operations

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.Log.description:
Log represents an protobuf compatible Ethereum Log that defines a contract
log event. These events are generated by the LOG opcode and stored/indexed by
the node.

NOTE: address, topics and data are consensus fields. The rest of the fields
are derived, i.e. filled in by the nodes, but not secured by consensus.

address.title: address of the contract that generated the event

block_hash.title: block_hash of the block in which the transaction was included

block_number.title: block_number of the block in which the transaction was included

data.title: data which is supplied by the contract, usually ABI-encoded

index.title: index of the log in the block

removed.description:
removed is true if this log was reverted due to a chain
reorganisation. You must pay attention to this field if you receive logs
through a filter query.

topics.description: topics is a list of topics provided by the contract.

tx_index.title: tx_index of the transaction in the block

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgEthereumTxResponse.description: MsgEthereumTxResponse defines the Msg/EthereumTx response type.

gas_used.title: gas_used specifies how much gas was consumed by the transaction

hash.title:
hash of the ethereum transaction in hex format. This hash differs from the
CometBFT sha256 hash of the transaction bytes. See
https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/issues/6539 for reference

logs.description:
logs contains the transaction hash and the proto-compatible ethereum
logs.

ret.title:
ret is the returned data from evm function (result or data supplied with
revert opcode)

vm_error.title: vm_error is the error returned by vm execution

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgRegisterPreinstalls.description: MsgRegisterPreinstalls defines a Msg for creating preinstalls in evm state.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

preinstalls.description: preinstalls defines the preinstalls to create.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgRegisterPreinstallsR.description:
MsgRegisterPreinstallsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgRegisterPreinstalls message.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams defines a Msg for updating the x/vm module parameters.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

params.description:
params defines the x/vm parameters to update.
NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResponse.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.Params.title: Params defines the EVM module parameters

access_control.title: access_control defines the permission policy of the EVM

active_static_precompiles.title:
active_static_precompiles defines the slice of hex addresses of the
precompiled contracts that are active

evm_channels.title: evm_channels is the list of channel identifiers from EVM compatible chains

evm_denom.description:
evm_denom represents the token denomination used to run the EVM state
transitions.

extra_eips.title: extra_eips defines the additional EIPs for the vm.Config

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.Preinstall.title:
Preinstall defines a contract that is preinstalled on-chain with a specific
contract address and bytecode

address.title: address in hex format of the preinstall contract

code.title: code in hex format for the preinstall contract
